Detailed Description

Class to store the results of a Gain calibration measurement, i.e.

gain plus the error of it for a certain chip/channel for a fixed moduleID

Author:
S. Schmidt DESY
Date:
Aug 18 2006

apply calibration error to current error

Parameters:
inputValue "energy" value before the gain calibration

Returns:
